jcr:content.jcr:title: Getting There: Sweet 16 and Licensed to Drive

contentheadline.headline: Getting There: Sweet 16 and Licensed to Drive

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Film |name = Getting There |image = Getting There (2002) video coverart.jpg |caption = DVD cover |director = [[Steve Purcell (director)|Steve Purcell]] |producer = [[Neil Steinberg (producer)|Neil Steinberg]], [[Natan Zahavi]] |writer = [[Michael Swerdlick]]<br /> Kate Ah Shay |starring = [[Ashley Olsen]], [[Mary-Kate Olsen]] |music = [[Steve Porcaro]] |cinematography = |editing = [[Sherwood Jones]] |distributor = [[Warner Bros.]] |released = June 11, 2002 |runtime = 85 min. |country = [[United States]] |language = [[English language|English]] |budget = }} '''''Getting There''''' is a 2002 [[direct-to-video]] [[film|movie]] starring [[Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen]]. ==Plot== The story revolves around twin sisters who, after turning 16, go on a [[road trip]] without their parents. Their destination is the [[2002 Winter Olympics]] in [[Salt Lake City]], [[Utah]]. The two girls, Kylie ([[Mary-Kate Olsen]]) and Taylor ([[Ashley Olsen]]) along with their friends Sam, Lyndi, Toast and others – head out on their first road trip to the Olympics in their new [[Ford Mustang]], which they received for their [[birthday]]. ==Cast== *[[Ashley Olsen]]: Taylor Hunter *[[Mary-Kate Olsen]]: Kylie Hunter *[[Billy Aaron Brown]]: Danny *[[Heather Lindell]]: Jenn *[[Jeff D'Agostino]]: Joshua (a.k.a. [[Toast]]) *[[Talon Ellithorpe]]: Sam *[[Holly Towne]]: Lyndi *[[Alexandra Picatto]]: Charly *[[Janet Gunn]]: Pam Hunter *[[William Bumiller]]: Gary Hunter *[[Jason Benesh]]: Alexander *[[Ricki Lopez]] :Juan *[[Shelley Malil]]: Raj *[[Marcus Smythe]]: Mr. Simms *[[Cheyenne Wilbur]]: Male proctor *[[Deborah Hinderstein]]: Female instructor *[[James Kiriyama Lem]]: Male instructor *[[Chene Lawson]]: Ticket clerk *[[Tracy Arbuckle]]: Diane *[[Sterling Rice]]: Young female tourist *[[Jeff Johnson]]: Waiter in ski lodge *[[Jason Farr]]: Airplane Pilot, All Ski Stunts ==External links== *[http://mary-kateandashley.com/getting_there/index.php "Getting There" at mary-kateandashley.com] * {{IMDb title|0307535|Getting There}} * {{Amg movie|263644|Getting There}} {{Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen}} [[Category:2002 direct-to-video films]] [[Category:American films]] [[Category:English-language films]] [[Category:2000s comedy films]] {{2000s-comedy-film-stub}}
